籤詩版本二:
Intwasahlobo iyeza, iintyatyambo ziyadubula kwibalcony, yaye iimoto ezihamba umgama ongamawaka eekhilomitha zizisa ubutyebi.
Ukuba ufumana igagasi lesithathu leYumen, liya kuba njengendudumo emhlabeni
詩意:
Le hexagram imele umfanekiso wokuhlangana nomlawuli enkundleni.
Yonke into ilungile kakhulu.
解曰:
Umlawuli wamiselwa. Njengobuncwane obufunyenwe kubuhlwempu. Landlela intliziyo yakho. Eyokuqala phakathi kweehexagrams.
Lo mqondiso ulandela umnqweno wentliziyo yakho. Konke kulungile.
籤詩故事一:
◇Iiyuan ezintathu kwishishini
UShang Ren (1414-1486), igama lembeko uHongzai, isiteketiso sikaSuting, isihloko emva kokufa kukaWenyi, wayeyinzalelwane yaseChun'an, eZhejiang, eTshayina. Wazalwa ngoFebruwari 25, unyaka weshumi elinesibini weYongle kwiMing Dynasty.
Uyise okanye ookhokho bakhe babengengomagosa, kodwa wayethandwa sisifundiswa uWang Rui kwiminyaka yakhe yokuqala.Kunyaka we-10 kaXuande kuMing Dynasty (1435), wabekwa kwindawo yokuqala kuviwo lwephondo (Xie Yuan). , akazange aphumelele kwiimviwo izihlandlo ezininzi, ngoko wazibhokoxa ekufundeni eTaixue, yaye wayethandwa kakhulu yiImperial Academy. ), waza wabekwa kwindawo yokuqala kuViwo lweBhotwe (Zhuangyuan). Kwi-Ming Dynasty, ngu-Huang Guan kuphela kunye naye, owagxothwa nguZhu Di, wayenalo le mbeko.
聖意: Ithamsanqa ekhaya, ithamsanqa, ithamsanqa kushishino, ithamsanqa emtshatweni, impumelelo eLiujia, iindaba ezimnandi kubahambi, iindaba ezimnandi emasimini, imisundululu, imfuyo echumileyo, ukufumana abantu, imbuyekezo, amatyala, impumelelo, ukufuduka, okulungileyo. ithamsanqa kwizifo, Anshan amangcwaba
